interfaces.core.init¶

Source: src\interfaces\core\__init__.py

Module Overview¶

Core interfaces and protocols for the interfaces framework. This module provides basic data types and communication protocols for the interface system.

Complete Source Code¶

 1#======================================================================================\\\
 2#========================== src/interfaces/core/__init__.py ===========================\\\
 3#======================================================================================\\\
 4
 5"""
 6Core interfaces and protocols for the interfaces framework.
 7This module provides basic data types and communication protocols
 8for the interface system.
 9"""
10
11# Import only what actually exists
12from .protocols import (
13    CommunicationProtocol, MessageProtocol, ConnectionProtocol,
14    SerializationProtocol, ErrorHandlerProtocol, DeviceProtocol
15)
16
17from .data_types import (
18    Message, ConnectionInfo, InterfaceConfig, ErrorInfo,
19    PerformanceMetrics, CommunicationStats, QueueConfig, DeviceInfo,
20    InterfaceType, TransportType, SecurityLevel
21)
22
23__all__ = [
24    # Protocols that actually exist
25    'CommunicationProtocol', 'MessageProtocol', 'ConnectionProtocol',
26    'SerializationProtocol', 'ErrorHandlerProtocol', 'DeviceProtocol',
27
28    # Data types that actually exist
29    'Message', 'ConnectionInfo', 'InterfaceConfig', 'ErrorInfo',
30    'PerformanceMetrics', 'CommunicationStats', 'QueueConfig', 'DeviceInfo',
31    'InterfaceType', 'TransportType', 'SecurityLevel'
32]

Dependencies¶

This module imports:

  • from .protocols import CommunicationProtocol, MessageProtocol, ConnectionProtocol, SerializationProtocol, ErrorHandlerProtocol, DeviceProtocol

  • from .data_types import Message, ConnectionInfo, InterfaceConfig, ErrorInfo, PerformanceMetrics, CommunicationStats, QueueConfig, DeviceInfo, InterfaceType, TransportType, SecurityLevel
